member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Wpf.UIHelper
member.summary: Class with helpful methods for various UI needs.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Wpf.UIHelper.FindChild``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.String)
member.summary: Finds a child of a given item in the visual tree.
member.typeparam: a type of the queried item
member.param: a direct parent of the queried item
member.returns: The first child item that matches the submited type parameter. If not matching item can be found, a null parent is being returned.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Wpf.UIHelper.FindParent``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Finds a parent a given item in the visual tree.
member.typeparam: a type of the queried item
member.param: a direct or indirect child of the queried item
member.returns: The first parent item that matches the submited type parameter. If not matching item can be found, a null parent is being returned.
